name: BRTPanLSkill
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
”Alexa, turn off kitchen light”
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the skill BRT PanL skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your skill BRT PanL compatible devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your skill. Once you have linked the skill with our PanL account and the devices are setup properly according to the user guide provided by PanL, You will need to "discover" PanL devices, you can say the following

"Alexa, discover my devices."

Once Alexa has discovered PanL device, you can then say

"Alexa, turn on bedroom light."
"Alexa, turn off bedroom light."
